text:
Musical talent apparently runs in the family!

Alicia Keys stopped by The Tonight Show Thursday and shared an adorable video of her youngest son, Genesis, showing off his beatboxing skills. Her husband, producer Swizz Beatz, posted the video, taken when Genesis was just 2 years old.

“He just started doing, he just kind of started getting his own flow,” Keys said of her son’s adorable talent. “Now his latest beatbox is around the word ‘avocado.’ He has a thing!”

Keys also gushed about her love for her fellow Voice coach Kelly Clarkson.

“I love Kelly…I never knew she had all this amazing personality. So it is amazing to see her shine,” she told Fallon. “She has that country twang, but she also has this other back home, down the road, take-your-earrings-off-and-beat-you-up thing.”

Watch the full clip:

https://parade.com/647639/paulettecohn/kelly-clarkson-adam-levine-blake-shelton-and-alicia-keys-reveal-why-the-voice-contestants-should-pick-their-team/
title: Alicia Keys’ 3-Year-Old Son Is an Amazing Beatboxer — Watch the Cute Video!
